text: (ebævin nabiye! ovunta) oba mese pavasanu:”allah hæra oba (deviyan yayi) kumak aradhana karannehuda, eva gæna oba avadhanaya kalehuda? eva bhumiyehi kumak nam utpadanaya kara ættehuda yanna oba ma hata penvanu! nætahot ahashi (evaye rajyayan ho nætahot eva utpadanaya kirimehi ho) evata kisiyam havulak ætda? oba satyavantayin vasayen sitinnehu nam, meyata (saksi vasayen) pera tibu yamkisi dharmayak, nætahot (me sambandhayen vu) gnana saksin gena enu”
